name: [Redacted] (BEEBOPMAN)
description:
Hello, and welcome to my page. This is my first game so please just have fun with it. I made this to learn some of the basics and hope to make better games in the future.

When a sudden Earthquake causes power loss in an underground research facility, no one is safe.

WASD - move

E - interact

F-Flashlight

SHIFT - sprint

P -Pause
